content: make yourself a pair of these crochet comfy slippers slip them on and stay warm while you crochet everyone else a pair for xmas gifts problem solved this pattern includes an 5 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s shoe sizes 5 - 12 any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #6 super bulky yarn i used buttercream luxe craft alpaca solid for the slipper part color a = gray i used lion brand go for faux thick & quick for the brim color b = mink/vison crochet hook size 8 mm scissors yarn needle stitch marker notes this pattern made as us women s shoe sizes 5/6 7/8 9/10 11/12 keep in mind these slippers can stretch a little so the sizes are flexible depending on how you want them to fit all sizes are made the same in this pattern just adding or subtracting row to the desired size just follow the size chart as you go in this picture i have demonstrated with size 7/8 gauge 10 half_double_crochet x 6 5 row = 4 yarn needed color a = 60 70 80 90 yards color b = 20 25 30 35 yards thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
